text:
One of the most talked about sequels is Imtiaz Ali's Love Aaj Kal. A lot has been said and written about this impending project. While reports have earlier confirmed that Kartik Aaryan has been locked for the role, a fresh report claims that it's not Sara but Kiara who has been approached.
A Bombay times report confirms that Kiara has been approached by the makers for the lead role.
Agencies
If all works out well, we will see Kiara romance Kartik Aaryan in a film directed by Imtiaz Ali and it all sounds perfect, isn't it?
Twitter
The film released in 2009 became a popular one. While the original one starred Deepika Padukone and Saif Ali Khan in lead roles, the sequel will have a special modern spin.

Earlier reports claim that a lot of other actresses were being considered for the role and one of them is newbie Sara Ali Khan. While Kiara has neither confirmed not turned down these reports, a lot is happening around this project.
title: Kiara Advani And Kartik Aaryan To Romance In Imtiaz Ali's Love Aaj Kal 2, Claim Reports!
